messages.description: It may be possible for the net [Process] to complete without any generated work. Check the empty tasks linking from i to o.
AtomicTask:Node1 any flow from any AND-split [AtomicTask:Node1] may not have an xpath predicate.
id-12 any flow from any XOR/OR-split [id-12] must have either a predicate or be a default flow.
id-12 the postset of any OR/XOR split must have exactly one default flow (not 0)
